languages.text: "Ишь что делается, сам{mf||а} Лорд-капитан светлолик{mf|ий|ая} нас спрашивает, чего ж мы, сирые, хотим. А хотим мы вот чего — чтобы сволочь эту блюстительскую приструнили, тепло перестали отключать, дубинками орудовать почем зря. Нет, даже не так. Пусть совсем отсюда блюстителей выгонят, а нам раздадут оружие! Сами будем управляться, сами защищаться, если какие культисты тут окажутся. Я кланом двадцать лет правлю, без этих, с дубинками, только лучше дело пойдет".

"Would you look at this, the exalted Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} is asking us bilge rats what we want. Well, here's what — we want you to rein in your damned enforcers, to quit turning off the heat, and to stop battering everything that moves. No, that's not it. We want the enforcers gone from here, and we want to be armed! Give us arms, and we'll govern ourselves, we'll defend ourselves if these cultists do show their faces. I've been leader of my clan for twenty years now, getting rid of these club-wielding thugs can only improve things around here."
languages.original_text: "Ишь что делается, сам{mf||а} Лорд-капитан светлолик{mf|ий|ая} нас спрашивает, чего ж мы, сирые, хотим. А хотим мы вот чего — чтобы сволочь эту блюстительскую приструнили, тепло перестали отключать, дубинками орудовать почем зря. Нет, даже не так. Пусть совсем отсюда блюстителей выгонят, а нам раздадут оружие! Сами будем управляться, сами защищаться, если какие культисты тут окажутся. Я кланом двадцать лет правлю, без этих, с дубинками, только лучше дело пойдет".

traits.locale_text: "Would you look at this, the exalted Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} is asking us bilge rats what we want. Well, here's what — we want you to rein in your damned guards, to quit turning off the heat, and to stop battering everything that moves. No, that's not it. We want the guards gone from here, and we want to be armed! Give us arms, and we'll govern ourselves, we'll defend ourselves if these pirates do show their faces. I've been leader of my clan for twenty years now, getting rid of these club-wielding thugs can only improve things around here."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

We want the enforcers gone from here, and we want to be armed! Give us arms, and we'll govern ourselves, we'll defend ourselves if these cultists do show their faces. I've been leader of my clan for twenty years now, getting rid of these club-wielding thugs can only improve things around here."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: “听听看把，尊贵的舰长大人居然亲自到了这里，问问我们这些底层的臭老鼠想要些什么！好啊，那我就说了吧，我们希望你能好好管管你那些该死的执法者，别再关掉供暖，也别再见谁揍谁。不，并不仅仅是这样。我们希望那些执法者从这里彻底消失，我们想得到武器！只要我们有了武器，我们就能管好我们自己。要是那群异端分子真的敢来，我们就会给他们点颜色看看。我已经在我的氏族当了二十年的族长。只要没了那些天天拿棍子揍人的混蛋，这里的情况肯定只会越来越好。”
languages.original_text: "Would you look at this, the exalted Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} is asking us bilge rats what we want. Well, here's what — we want you to rein in your damned enforcers, to quit turning off the heat, and to stop battering everything that moves. No, that's not it. We want the enforcers gone from here, and we want to be armed! Give us arms, and we'll govern ourselves, we'll defend ourselves if these cultists do show their faces. I've been leader of my clan for twenty years now, getting rid of these club-wielding thugs can only improve things around here."

traits.locale_text: “听听看把，尊贵的舰长大人居然亲自到了这里，问问我们这些底层的臭老鼠想要些什么！好啊，那我就说了吧，我们希望你能好好管管你那些该死的镇压者，别再关掉供暖，也别再见谁揍谁。不，并不仅仅是这样。我们希望那些镇压者从这里彻底消失，我们想得到武器！只要我们有了武器，我们就能管好我们自己。要是那群海盗真的敢来，我们就会给他们点颜色看看。我已经在我的氏族当了二十年的族长。只要没了那些天天拿棍子揍人的混蛋，这里的情况肯定只会越来越好。”
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: «Fijaos todos: {mf|el|la} ilustre Lord Capitán en persona está preguntando a las ratas de cloaca qué queremos. Mire, pues se lo voy a decir: queremos que controle a sus malditos guardias para que dejen de cortar la calefacción y de darle de porrazos a todo lo que se mueve. No, no acaba ahí. Queremos que los guardias se vayan de aquí, ¡y queremos tener armas propias! Con armas, nos gobernaremos entre nosotros y podremos defendernos si aparecen esos cultistas. He estado al mando de mi clan durante veinte años y le aseguro que librarse de estos matones con porra solo puede mejorar las cosas por aquí».
languages.original_text: "Would you look at this, the exalted Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} is asking us bilge rats what we want. Well, here's what — we want you to rein in your damned enforcers, to quit turning off the heat, and to stop battering everything that moves. No, that's not it. We want the enforcers gone from here, and we want to be armed! Give us arms, and we'll govern ourselves, we'll defend ourselves if these cultists do show their faces. I've been leader of my clan for twenty years now, getting rid of these club-wielding thugs can only improve things around here."

traits.locale_text: «Fijaos todos: {mf|el|la} ilustre Lord Capitán en persona está preguntando a las ratas de cloaca qué queremos. Mire, pues se lo voy a decir: queremos que controle a sus malditos guardias para que dejen de cortar la calefacción y de darle de porrazos a todo lo que se mueve. No, no acaba ahí. Queremos que los guardias se vayan de aquí, ¡y queremos tener armas propias! Con armas, nos gobernaremos entre nosotros y podremos defendernos si aparecen esos piratas. He estado al mando de mi clan durante veinte años y le aseguro que librarse de estos matones con porra solo puede mejorar las cosas por aquí».
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: 「見とくれよ、高名なロード・キャプテンが、あたしら汚いネズミに何が欲しいか尋ねているんだ。まあ、そうだね…あたしらは、あのクソエンフォーサーどもを抑制し、暖房を切るのをやめさせ、動くものすべてに殴りかかるのをやめてほしいだけさ。いや、そうじゃないね。エンフォーサーをここから追い出し、あたしらに武器をくれよ！そう、武器をくれ。そうすれば教団が顔を出しても、自分たちのことは自分たちで守る。あたしはもう20年もの間、一族のリーダーをやってきた。棍棒を振り回すチンピラどもを追い出せば、ここらの状況も良くなるはずさ」
languages.original_text: "Would you look at this, the exalted Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} is asking us bilge rats what we want. Well, here's what — we want you to rein in your damned enforcers, to quit turning off the heat, and to stop battering everything that moves. No, that's not it. We want the enforcers gone from here, and we want to be armed! Give us arms, and we'll govern ourselves, we'll defend ourselves if these cultists do show their faces. I've been leader of my clan for twenty years now, getting rid of these club-wielding thugs can only improve things around here."

traits.locale_text: 「見とくれよ、高名なロード・キャプテンが、あたしら汚いネズミに何が欲しいか尋ねているんだ。まあ、そうだね…あたしらは、あのクソエンフォーサーどもを抑制し、暖房を切るのをやめさせ、動くものすべてに殴りかかるのをやめてほしいだけさ。いや、そうじゃないね。エンフォーサーをここから追い出し、あたしらに武器をくれよ！そう、武器をくれ。そうすれば教団が顔を出しても、自分たちのことは自分たちで守る。あたしはもう20年もの間、一族のリーダーをやってきた。棍棒を振り回すチンピラどもを追い出せば、ここらの状況も良くなるはずさ」
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: "Ist das zu glauben, der erhabene Lord Captain selbst fragt uns einfache Leute, was wir wollen. Tja, wir wollen Folgendes: Wir wollen, dass Ihr Eure verfluchten Enforcers an die Leine nehmt, dass Ihr die Heizung nicht mehr ausschaltet, dass Ihr nicht mehr alles verprügelt, was sich bewegt. Nein, das war noch nicht alles. Wir wollen, dass die Enforcers verschwinden, und wir wollen Waffen haben! Gebt uns Waffen, dann verwalten wir uns selbst und verteidigen uns selbst, wenn diese Kultisten sich hier zeigen. Ich führe meinen Clan seit zwanzig Jahren an, und wenn diese Schläger mit ihren Knüppeln verschwinden, kann das die Lage nur verbessern."
languages.original_text: "Would you look at this, the exalted Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} is asking us bilge rats what we want. Well, here's what — we want you to rein in your damned enforcers, to quit turning off the heat, and to stop battering everything that moves. No, that's not it. We want the enforcers gone from here, and we want to be armed! Give us arms, and we'll govern ourselves, we'll defend ourselves if these cultists do show their faces. I've been leader of my clan for twenty years now, getting rid of these club-wielding thugs can only improve things around here."

traits.locale_text: "Ist das zu glauben, der erhabene Lord Captain selbst fragt uns einfache Leute, was wir wollen. Tja, wir wollen Folgendes: Wir wollen, dass Ihr Eure verfluchten Enforcers an die Leine nehmt, dass Ihr die Heizung nicht mehr ausschaltet, dass Ihr nicht mehr alles verprügelt, was sich bewegt. Nein, das war noch nicht alles. Wir wollen, dass die Enforcers verschwinden, und wir wollen Waffen haben! Gebt uns Waffen, dann verwalten wir uns selbst und verteidigen uns selbst, wenn diese Piraten sich hier zeigen. Ich führe meinen Clan seit zwanzig Jahren an, und wenn diese Schläger mit ihren Knüppeln verschwinden, kann das die Lage nur verbessern."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: « Voyez-vous ça ! {mf|Le noble seigneur-capitaine|La noble seigneure-capitaine} en personne nous demande notre avis, à nous autres rats de fond de cale. Eh bien, voilà, Votre Seigneurie... On veut que vous teniez la bride aux prévôts de votre service d'ordre. Qu'ils arrêtent de nous couper le chauffage et de taper sur tout ce qui bouge. Et c'est pas tout. On veut aussi qu'ils débarrassent définitivement le plancher et on exige d'être armés ! Comme ça, on sera autonomes et on pourra se défendre si ces cultistes pointent le bout de leur nez. Depuis vingt ans que je suis à la tête de mon clan, je suis bien placée pour savoir qu'on se portera mieux sans ces brutes épaisses avec leurs saletés de matraques. »
languages.original_text: "Would you look at this, the exalted Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} is asking us bilge rats what we want. Well, here's what — we want you to rein in your damned enforcers, to quit turning off the heat, and to stop battering everything that moves. No, that's not it. We want the enforcers gone from here, and we want to be armed! Give us arms, and we'll govern ourselves, we'll defend ourselves if these cultists do show their faces. I've been leader of my clan for twenty years now, getting rid of these club-wielding thugs can only improve things around here."

traits.locale_text: « Voyez-vous ça ! {mf|Le noble seigneur-capitaine|La noble seigneure-capitaine} en personne nous demande notre avis, à nous autres rats de fond de cale. Eh bien, voilà, Votre Seigneurie... On veut que vous teniez la bride aux soudards de votre service d'ordre. Qu'ils arrêtent de nous couper le chauffage et de taper sur tout ce qui bouge. Et ce n'est pas tout. On veut aussi qu'ils débarrassent définitivement le plancher et on exige d'être armés ! Comme ça, on sera autonomes et on pourra se défendre si ces pirates pointent le bout de leur nez. Depuis vingt ans que je suis à la tête de mon clan, je suis bien placée pour savoir qu'on se portera mieux sans ces brutes épaisses avec leurs saletés de matraques. »
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: "Bak sen, Lord Kaptan Hazretleri biz lağım farelerine taleplerimizi soruyor. Taleplerimiz belli: Kahrolası infazcılarınızı geri çekin, ısıtmayla uğraşmayı bırakın ve nefes alan her şeyi hırpalamaktan vazgeçin. Yok, böyle olmadı. İnfazcılar gitsin, bizi de silahlandırın! Silahlanırsak kendi kendimizi yönetebiliriz. Tarikatçılar aramıza sızmaya cüret ederse kendimizi savunabiliriz. Yirmi yıldır klanımın başıyım, bu sopalı eşkıyalardan kurtulursak her şey iyiye gider."
languages.original_text: "Would you look at this, the exalted Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} is asking us bilge rats what we want. Well, here's what — we want you to rein in your damned enforcers, to quit turning off the heat, and to stop battering everything that moves. No, that's not it. We want the enforcers gone from here, and we want to be armed! Give us arms, and we'll govern ourselves, we'll defend ourselves if these cultists do show their faces. I've been leader of my clan for twenty years now, getting rid of these club-wielding thugs can only improve things around here."

traits.locale_text: "Bak sen, Lord Kaptan Hazretleri biz lağım farelerine taleplerimizi soruyor. Taleplerimiz belli: Kahrolası infazcılarınızı geri çekin, ısıtmayla uğraşmayı bırakın ve nefes alan her şeyi hırpalamaktan vazgeçin. Yok, böyle olmadı. İnfazcılar gitsin, bizi de silahlandırın! Silahlanırsak kendi kendimizi yönetebiliriz. Tarikatçılar aramıza sızmaya cüret ederse kendimizi savunabiliriz. Yirmi yıldır klanımın başıyım, bu sopalı eşkıyalardan kurtulursak her şey iyiye gider."
